title: Fox Presents | The Search for Sasquatch, The Beginning
description:
The hunt continues…..
Once thought of as a hoax, myth or legend, the Sasquatch is real. Sought after for its exquisite fur and incredible features, it hides in dark forests and wonders the mountainsides.
Rarely does it reveal itself, but the evidence exists. It’s out there.
And so, the hunt will continue…

Camera/Edit:
Ryan Marcus

Hunter:
Scott Wynn

Voice of Hunter:
Robert Zepeda
